article_title: Carolinas HealthCare System’s CEO says health care industry is target for cuts
article_text: As hospitals across North Carolina have closed or cut staff, Carolinas HealthCare System’s chief executive warned Tuesday that the state Senate’s proposed Medicaid cuts could jeopardize the financial viability of hospitals and impose burdens on some of the state’s most vulnerable citizens.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Carolinas HealthCare System, Charlotte, Michael Tarwater, Medicaid, legislature
